name: sgrpssmgm

stmt.origin: mp2an(wpss(csgrp, cmgm), wss(csgrp, cmgm), wrex(hs0, cmgm, wnel(cv(hs0), csgrp)))
stmt.pretty: mp2an(SGrp ⊊ Mgm, SGrp ⊆ Mgm, ∃(hs0 ∈ Mgm, hs0 ∉ SGrp))

body.origin:
|- wpss(csgrp, cmgm)
-| wss(csgrp, cmgm)
-| wrex(hs0, cmgm, wnel(cv(hs0), csgrp))
-| wi(wa(wss(csgrp, cmgm), wrex(hs0, cmgm, wnel(cv(hs0), csgrp))), wpss(csgrp, cmgm))
body.pretty:
⊢ SGrp ⊊ Mgm
⊣ SGrp ⊆ Mgm
⊣ ∃(hs0 ∈ Mgm, hs0 ∉ SGrp)
⊣ ((SGrp ⊆ Mgm ∧ ∃(hs0 ∈ Mgm, hs0 ∉ SGrp))→ SGrp ⊊ Mgm)
